sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" import femaleProfile from "./images/female-icon.jpg" import maleProfile from "./images/male-icon.jpg" const Employees = () => { const [selectedTeam, setTeam] = useState("TeamB") handleTeamSelectionChange const [employees] = useState([{ id: 1, fullName: "Bob Jones", designation: "JavaScript Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamA" }, { id: 2, fullName: "Jill Bailey", designation: "Node Developer", gender: "female", teamName: "TeamA" }, { id: 3, fullName: "Gail Shepherd", designation: "Java Developer", gender: "female", teamName: "TeamA" }, { id: 4, fullName: "Sam Reynolds", designation: "React Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamB" }, { id: 5, fullName: "David Henry", designation: "DotNet Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamB" }, { id: 6, fullName: "Sarah Blake", designation: "SQL Server DBA", gender: "female", teamName: "TeamB" }, { id: 7, fullName: "James Bennet", designation: "Angular Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamC" }, { id: 8, fullName: "Jessica Faye", designation: "API Developer", gender: "female", teamName: "TeamC" }, { id: 9, fullName: "Lita Stone", designation: "C++ Developer", gender: "female", teamName: "TeamC" }, { id: 10, fullName: "Daniel Young", designation: "Python Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamD" }, { id: 11, fullName: "Adrian Jacobs", designation: "Vue Developer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamD" }, { id: 12, fullName: "Devin Monroe", designation: "Graphic Designer", gender: "male", teamName: "TeamD" }]) return (
{ employees.map((employee) => { return (
{(employee.gender === "male") ? () : ()}
Full Name: {employee.fullName}

Designation {employee.designation}

) }) }
) } export default Employees
